description.main: Lists the best scores in the provided game type.

options.name: game

description.main: Create a password with some fun set of rules.
description.more: Creating a strong password is tough? Password game gives some set of condition that needs to be fulfilled to create a strong and easy to remember password.

description.main: Get the definition of the word that you dont know.

options.name: word

description.main: Gets the list of commands present in the bot.
description.more: You can even get information about a specfic command by passing the command name too.

options.name: command
options.description: The command name that you want to get information about.
